item.title: The Silent Valley
item.description: US President Donald Trump’s intervention in Kashmir is all over, after he agreed that it is a bilateral issue to be resolved by India and Pakistan.

item.title: The Fading Glitter of Gold
item.description: All that glitters is not gold NOW for a common man. The yellow metal prices continue to rise further touching a 40,000 mark today. How does gold affect the economy?

item.title: The New World Champ
item.description: Pusarla V Sindhu did the country proud by becoming the first Indian to win the coveted gold medal at the World Badminton Championship held at Basle, Switzerland.

item.title: Chidambaram's Tryst With Destiny
item.description: What a drama has been created by the top echelons of our society and by that I mean CBI - the most trusted investigating agency of a democratic India.
